'''18w21b''' is the thirty-ninth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on May 25, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w21b|May 25, 2018}}</ref>.

== Additions ==
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Added sound for [[husk]]s converting to [[zombie]]s.

== Changes ==
* Fixed a crash which occurred during world generation.
